00058                         AP4_Movie& movie,

00066                                       AP4_TimeStamp& actual_ts);

00068     AP4_Result      Rewind();

00070     AP4_Track*      GetMediaTrack() { return m_MediaTrack; }
00071     
00072 private:
00073     // methods
00074     AP4_Result GetRtpSample(AP4_Ordinal index);
00075     AP4_Result BuildRtpPacket(AP4_RtpPacket*  packet, 
00076                               AP4_DataBuffer& packet_data);
00077     AP4_Result WriteImmediateRtpData(AP4_ImmediateRtpConstructor* constructor,
00078                                      AP4_ByteStream*              data_stream);
